page.title: 13Waverton Village Fete
page.content: Waverton Village Fete is always held on the first Saturday in July.There are always floats from each housing estate and these are judged in Greenfield Cres.The"Mary Poppins"float won this year.Former residents,Mr&Mrs Richardson opened the Fete.Elizabeth Pattinson from our class was the new Rose Queen.There was a marquee with a bar and about forty different stalls. The Scouts had two stalls,one a mock village stocks,and a snooker game.The attractions included a strong man from Tattenhall,a magician,a lawn mower race,and a BMX bicycle demonstration. The Fete includes events such as a quiz evening Its a Knockout type games and a Fun run for the Village Pump TROPHY .The proceeds of the fete go to the Village Green project creating a new amenity alongside the playing field primary school and the canal.
